author: admin
title: Monstrously good! Parrot’s stunning imitation of Rihanna in Eminem song becomes internet sensation – Daily Mail
text: Share this article Share 'You're trying to save me, stop holding your breath - and you think I'm crazy, yeah, you think I'm crazy.' This sassy parrot is threatening to upstage Rihanna after a video of the bird singing the pop star's lines in an Eminem song became an internet sensation The tropical bird is quite a drama queen, gazing at the camera while nailing its rendition of the American rapper's 2013 hit single The tropical bird is quite a drama queen. During the clip the parrot can be seen strutting up and down its perch like a model on a catwalk. At one point the green and yellow bird even seemed to think it had hair like Rihanna, flicking its head as if to toss its curly locks for the audience. Rihanna and Eminem perform The Monster live on stage at the MTV Movie Awards in April 2014 at the Nokia Theatre in Los Angeles Rihanna, 29, and Eminem, 44, first collaborated on 2010 single Love The Way You Lie before reuniting for The Monster. Eminem released The Monster as the fourth single from his album, The Marshall Mathers LP 2, in October 2013. The video of the parrot has been met with enthusiasm by many online commenters. Fausto Duantos said: 'Someone has to show Rihanna.' Rihanna, 29, and Eminem, 44, first collaborated on 2010 single Love The Way You Lie before reuniting for The Monster Share or comment on this article 11
